content: size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle **gauge** 10 single_crochet = 2 25 6 cm across with smaller hook *for best fit always check your gauge * 13 sts in 3 double_crochet chain-1 space pattern = 4 10 cm across with larger hook *for best fit always check your gauge * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/01/granny-square-month-is-back/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/09/julietta-bottom-up-granny-stitch-slouch-pattern/
